# UBcovidsurv

`UBcovidsurv` encapsulate a shiny app 

## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/borishejblum/UBcovidsurv):
```{r GitHub-install, eval=FALSE}
#install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("borishejblum/UBcovidsurv")
```


Then you can launch the app with:
``` r
UBcovidsurv::run_app()
```

## Deployed UBcovidsurv

 * Latest **development** version is deployed at https://shiny-u-bordeaux-covidsurv.apps.math.cnrs.fr

-- Boris Hejblum
